body_html:
Copying the command line that it says fails, works perfectly now that the patch command has been put within ' ':

c:\tensorflow>C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c 'patch -p1 -d C:/users/cm/_bazel_cm/xv6zejqw/external/kafka -i C:/tensorflow/third_party/kafka/config.patch'
patching file config.h
